COMMUNITY MAGAZINE :BLACK WOMEN JOURNEY IN TECH

BWT Magazine

Who we Are & what do we do



Community Magazine that covers local events , for women in tech. You can enjoy both current and back issues on your tablet, PC and smartphone, and best of all, you can use up to five devices. This means the whole family can enjoy.

What we do

Getting started is very simple. You tap the magazine you would like to read and it will open within seconds.Readly is also convenient for times when you have limited or no Internet access. The magazines download on to your device so you can read them whenever you want, wherever you are.

You can try before you buy. Sign up and get two weeks of free, unlimited access. No strings attached. As a Readly subscriber thereafter you pay a fixed monthly fee for access to everything in our catalogue. There is no minimum term and you can cancel at any time."
